pullrequest.title: Better fix for #236 for IMU that doesn't require ABI changes

content.raw: originally I was thinking this might help keep the value of `this->lastMeasurementTime` unchanged, with the exception that sim time goes backwards. But thinking about it some more, I am starting to believe that's the case even without the additional check for negative `dt`.
content.html: originally I was thinking this might help keep the value of this->lastMeasurementTime unchanged, with the exception that sim time goes backwards. But thinking about it some more, I am starting to believe that's the case even without the additional check for negative dt.
